UPDATE T_SYS_DICT SET DICT_TYPE = #{dictType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DICT_NAME = #{dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DICT_VALUE = #{dictValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DICT_CODE = #{dictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DICT_SORT = #{dictSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT_NUM = #{sortNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PARENT_TYPE = #{parentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISPLAY_SORT = #{displaySort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DICT_CLASS = #{dictClass,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MULTI_TYPE = #{multiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, displaying = #{displaying,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_url = #{dictUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isdefault = #{isdefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE DICT_ID = #{dictId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T_SYS_DICT WHERE DICT_VALUE IS NOT NULL and displaying='1' order by SORT_NUM
select ifnull(max(t1.sort_num), 0) + 1 from t_sys_dict t1 where t1.parent_type = #{parentType}
